name: The Virgin and Child with Angels
description: The Virgin and Child with Angels; Master of Guillebert de Mets (Flemish, active about 1410 - 1450); Ghent (probably), Belgium; about 1450 - 1455; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 19.4 x 14 cm (7 5/8 x 5 1/2 in.); Ms. 2, fol. 37v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Virgin and Child with Angels
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
